name: biopsic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or involving a biopsy (= the removal and medical examination of a small amount of tissue from someone's body): A biopsic examination was performed. We examined biopsic material taken from patients with Alzheimer's disease.
More examplesFewer examplesOn day 0 and day 30, biopsic examinations were performed in all subjects of each group.Biopsic investigation is one way of establishing the diagnosis. Analysis is made on lymphomas in biopsic material.The effectiveness of two types of biopsic needle is compared in the paper.
